elasticsearch.title: Elasticsearch Admin
elasticsearch.description: Manage search infrastructure, indices, and synchronization
elasticsearch.recreateWarning: Are you sure you want to recreate {{index}}? This will delete ALL data in this index and create a fresh empty index. This action cannot be undone.
elasticsearch.indicesDescription: Manage Elasticsearch indices and their data
elasticsearch.mappingDescription: Field definitions and types for this index
elasticsearch.syncOperationsDesc: Trigger synchronization between PostgreSQL and Elasticsearch
elasticsearch.fullReindexDesc: Reindex all data from PostgreSQL. Use when ES data is out of sync or corrupted.
elasticsearch.reindexStartedDesc: Full reindex has been started. This may take several minutes.
elasticsearch.confirmReindexDesc: This will reindex ALL data from PostgreSQL to Elasticsearch. This operation may take several minutes depending on data volume. Are you sure you want to proceed?
elasticsearch.incrementalSyncDesc: Sync only changed documents since last sync. Faster than full reindex.
elasticsearch.entityReindexDesc: Reindex a specific entity type only.
elasticsearch.cleanupOrphansDesc: Remove documents from ES that no longer exist in PostgreSQL.
elasticsearch.noSyncHistoryDesc: Sync operations will appear here once executed
elasticsearch.dataQualityDesc: Compare document counts between PostgreSQL and Elasticsearch
elasticsearch.syncIssuesDetected: {{count}} entities are out of sync. Consider running a full reindex to resolve discrepancies.
elasticsearch.dataQualityNote: Minor differences (1-5 documents) may be due to timing or pending sync operations. Larger differences may require investigation or a full reindex.
elasticsearch.criticalAlert: Elasticsearch cluster is in critical state. Some search features may be unavailable.
elasticsearch.connectionError: Unable to connect to Elasticsearch. Please check that the service is running.
